Name: MogucchiShooter
Notes: A mole enemy that uses a floating cannon to shoot cannonballs at the player. If the object's name is KillerShooter, it will shoot Bullet Bills instead. It can be defeated using Yoshi's projectiles or explosions.

Obj_arg0.Name: Launch Delay
Obj_arg0.Description: The delay between shots. Default is 90.

SW_A.Description: If used, it won't shoot projectiles while this switch is not activated. Furthermore, its clipping will be toggled when this switch's state changes.

Player2Targetable.Description: Can be targeted and frozen by player 2.
